channel.title: Install redash through docker. how can i connect mysql on the localhost
channel.description: I install redash on the mac through docker. Mysql also had been installed on the mac. And mysql also allowed any host. I can reference mysql on other host. But when connect mysql,it has some err:"2006, "Connection Test Failed:Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock'". I don't know why？

item.title: Install redash through docker. how can i connect mysql on the localhost

item.description:
Yes that’s the solution I would recommend also

item.title: Install redash through docker. how can i connect mysql on the localhost
item.dc:creator: poryfly
item.description:
I install redash on the mac through docker. Mysql also had been installed on the mac. And mysql also allowed any host. I can reference mysql on other host. But when connect mysql,it has some err:"2006, “Connection Test Failed:Can’t connect to local MySQL server through socket ‘/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock’”. I don’t know why？

Read full topic
